main

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Connection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Connections are the people connected to our mud; later we will build a character around them and put them in the game.
